# Async Docs

## Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await

- [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/index.md): Learn more about: Asynchronous programming with Async and Await (Visual Basic)
- [Walkthrough: Accessing the Web by Using Async and Await](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/walkthrough-accessing-the-web-by-using-async-and-await.md): Learn more about: Walkthrough: Accessing the Web by Using Async and Await (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Extend the Async Walkthrough by Using Task.WhenAll](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/how-to-extend-the-async-walkthrough-by-using-task-whenall.md): Learn more about: How to: Extend the Async Walkthrough by Using Task.WhenAll (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Make Multiple Web Requests in Parallel by Using Async and Await](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/how-to-make-multiple-web-requests-in-parallel-by-using-async-and-await.md): Learn more about: How to: Make Multiple Web Requests in Parallel by Using Async and Await (Visual Basic)
- [Async Return Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/async-return-types.md): Learn more about: Async Return Types (Visual Basic)
- [Control Flow in Async Programs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/control-flow-in-async-programs.md): Learn more about: Control Flow in Async Programs (Visual Basic)
- [Handling Reentrancy in Async Apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/handling-reentrancy-in-async-apps.md): Learn more about: Handling Reentrancy in Async Apps (Visual Basic)
- [Using Async for File Access](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/using-async-for-file-access.md): Learn more about: Using Async for File Access (Visual Basic)

## Fine-Tuning Your Async Application

- [Fine-Tuning Your Async Application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/fine-tuning-your-async-application.md): Learn more about: Fine-Tuning Your Async Application (Visual Basic)
- [Cancel an Async Task or a List of Tasks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/cancel-an-async-task-or-a-list-of-tasks.md): Learn more about: Cancel an Async Task or a List of Tasks (Visual Basic)
- [Cancel Async Tasks after a Period of Time](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/cancel-async-tasks-after-a-period-of-time.md): Learn more about: Cancel Async Tasks after a Period of Time (Visual Basic)
- [Cancel Remaining Async Tasks after One Is Complete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/cancel-remaining-async-tasks-after-one-is-complete.md): Learn more about: Cancel Remaining Async Tasks after One Is Complete (Visual Basic)
- [Start Multiple Async Tasks and Process Them As They Complete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/async/start-multiple-async-tasks-and-process-them-as-they-complete.md): Learn more about: Start Multiple Async Tasks and Process Them As They Complete (Visual Basic)
